document.full_text: italy's parliament is due to vote on a justice reform bill on wednesday which would cut the length of many trials and end a bribery case against prime minister silvio berlusconi.
document.title: italy votes on justice bill cutting berlusconi trial
lines_and_colors: italy's parliament is due to vote on a justice reform bill on wednesday which would cut the length of many trials and end a bribery case against prime minister silvio berlusconi.
